types:type.name: ordersjsonMetaData
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type ordersjsonMetaData = {| amount: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, created: String, modified: Null, discountid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, userid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, addressid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, status: String |} {"example": "{\\\"amount\\\":10000,\\\"orderid\\\":100,\\\"created\\\":\\\"2020-02-02T00:00:00\\\",\\\"modified\\\":null,\\\"discountid\\\":12,\\\"userid\\\":1000,\\\"addressid\\\":200,\\\"status\\\":\\\"shipped\\\"}"}
